name: frog_game
description:
Current bugs(not flies): 

  • Issues when dying/pressing e to escape and being sent back to the menu. 
  • Enemies do not respawn. 
  • The end screen will not trigger if you gain another fly in the background.

Welcome to frog game. This game requires microphone input and your mouse to get flies and progress. You will be on a timer, if you dont have 10 flies when the timer runs out then you lose. If you get all the flies before the timer runs out you will get a bonus.
